wikipedia_page.main: Joy Lofthouse (14 February 1923 – 15 November 2017) was a British pilot having joined the Air Transport Auxiliary as an ab initio pilot in December 1943. She went on to fly Spitfires and bombers for the Air Transport Auxiliary (ATA), and was one of only 168 "Attagirls" who served.

response: * 14 February – Joy Lofthouse, World War II pilot (died 2017)
*Joy Lofthouse, 94, British World War II pilot.WW2 Spitfire pilot Joy Lofthouse dies aged 94
